summary: The Christian Democratic Union of Germany or Christlich Demokratische Union Deutschlands  is one of the two main right of centre political parties in Germany.
full_text:
The Christian Democratic Union of Germany  is a Christian democratic and liberal-conservative political party in Germany. It is the major catch-all party of the centre-right in German politics. Along with its Bavarian sister party the Christian Social Union in Bavaria , the CDU forms the CDU/CSU grouping, also known as the Union, in the Bundestag.
The leader of the party, Angela Merkel, is the current Chancellor of Germany. The CDU is a member of the European People's Party  and sits in the EPP Group in the European Parliament.
title: Christian Democratic Union of Germany
